Megatron scowled, and instinctivly raised his arm to fire off another
fusion blast, but in the haste of the battle he forgot he had already
lost it, and instead of counterfire, he was first blasted in the face by
acid pellets, then water pressure took out his knees, pushing him
several feet back away from the battle.

(Ummmm, yeah, my big bad, oh wait, Soundwave heard Blade talking to him
over the roar of the helicopter, yeah, that was it.)

Soundwave rolled onto his back, and quickly grabbed his laser rifle,
aiming it upwards at the helicopter, and let loose a barrage (5 shots,
what the hey) at the airborn Protectobot, using the ground as a cution
against the recoil.

Rumble was worse for wear than his tackler, as he still blindly reached
for his laser rifle, he could barely move his legs, blinking his optics
profusly to try to get them on line again.

Spasstik continued his run, spiraling gracefully in mid air, barely
dodging the blasts, as he limbered through them. He landed in a crouch
position, facing Streetwise, as he growled nervously, more of a warning
towards the Autobot.

OOC: Just like the good old days, I'm glad the rpg is getting back to a
normal routine, cause damn this can be fun.
